Text_English: You can select an enhancement stone for this item.
Text_Korean: 這是一個允許您選擇升艙座位的項目。

Text_English: With this item, you can choose five of the upgraded seats.
Text_Korean: 此項目允許您選擇 5 個升艙座位。

Text_English: With this item, you can choose 10 promotion seats.
Text_Korean: 此項目允許您選擇 10 個升級座位。

Text_English: With this item, you can choose 15 promotion seats.
Text_Korean: 此項目允許您選擇 15 個升級座位。

Text_English: The hidden powers of your weapon resonates with the powerful magic gem.
Text_Korean: 在耀眼的光芒中蘊含強大魔力的寶石，引出武器的隱藏力量。

Text_English: The hidden powers of your armor resonates with the powerful magic gem.
Text_Korean: 閃耀著強大的魔力，將鎧甲隱藏的力量帶出的寶石。

Text_English: The hidden powers of your trinket resonates with the powerful magic gem.
Text_Korean: 在耀眼的光芒中蘊含強大的魔力，將珠寶隱藏的力量引出的寶石。

Text_English: You can use this to purchase items from the store.
Text_Korean: 這些是從商店購買商品所需的商品。
